title: Keep Your Walls Up | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Keep Your Walls Up | Joel Osteen
description:
If we’re not careful, negative thoughts and worries can poison our spirits. We can’t stop everything from happening, but we can learn not to allow everything in.


Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.


To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
